summary: Moments from the uncompromisingly bleak existence of a secretary, her intellectually disabled sister, aloof and uneasy teacher boyfriend, bizarre neighbor and irritating workmate.
cast: Anne Raitt|Sarah Stephenson|Eric Allan|Joolia Cappleman|Mike Bradwell|Liz Smith|Malcolm Smith|Donald Sumpter|Christopher Martin|Linda Beckett|Sandra Bolton|Stephen Churchett|Una Brandon-Jones|Ronald Eng|Reginald Stewart|Susan Glanville|Joanna Dickens|Christopher Leaver|Peter Chandler|Brian Chenley|Ina Clough|Pat Farrand|Sandra Jewell|Lin Layram|Ruth Lesirge|David Marigold|Neil May|P.A. Rowley|Marion Turner|Ken Wheatcroft
title: Bleak Moments
